scripts.install-circomlib: git clone https://github.com/iden3/circomlib.git circuits/circomlib && cd circuits/circomlib && npm install
scripts.install-rapidsnark: git clone https://github.com/iden3/rapidsnark.git circuits/rapidsnark && cd circuits/rapidsnark && npm install
scripts.install-deps: npm run install-circomlib && npm run install-rapidsnark
